issue.title: [Integration] Add nested dictionary integration test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2412](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2412). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add nested dictionary generator to the integration test. The tests will probably fail at first but can serve as a starting point for developing this capability.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2412?focusedCommentId=16548633) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Marked for 0.11 release cycle so we can investigate

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2412?focusedCommentId=16761470) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~bhulette]` is there a patch for this?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2412?focusedCommentId=16827780) by Brian Hulette (bhulette):*
`[~wesmckinn]` yes there is a (very outdated) patch: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1848

I never merged it for fear of making the tests fail, but I should probably just add it with the generate call commented out.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2412?focusedCommentId=16829335) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
We can rebase the patch and return to the issue

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2412?focusedCommentId=16842661) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1848
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1848>
